Markers

A marker is a type of label that can be attached in any images or cards component with the help of utilities/helper classes.

Basic Example

The most basic marker that is attached to image and card component.

Sample Marker
<div class="position-relative w-50">
  <div class="marker top-left shadow-sm">Image Marker</div>
  <img src="../assets/img/img2.jpg" class="img-fluid rounded" alt="">
</div>



Positioning

A marker can change it's position with the help of position helper classes.

Top Left Marker
Top Right Marker
Bottom Left Marker
Bottom Right Marker
<div class="marker top-left">Top Left Marker</div>
<div class="marker top-right">Top Right Marker</div>
<div class="marker bottom-left">Bottom Left Marker</div>
<div class="marker bottom-right">Bottom Right Marker</div>



Icon Marker

A marker can be an icon with the use of class .marker-icon.

<div class="marker-icon top-left"><i class="ri-star-line"></i></div>
<div class="marker-icon bottom-right"><i class="ri-star-line"></i></div>



Ribbon Marker

A marker style variant like ribbon like in the example below.

Top Left Marker
Top Right Marker
<div class="marker-ribbon top-left">Top Left Marker</div>
<div class="marker-ribbon top-right">Top Right Marker</div>



Contextual Variations

Add any of the below mentioned modifier classes to change the appearance of a marker. The example below uses border color utility class for card component and not part of the marker style.

Primary
Success
<div class="marker marker-primary top-left">Primary</div>
<div class="marker-icon marker-danger top-left"><i class="ri-star-line"></i></div>
<div class="marker-ribbon marker-success top-left">Success</div>



Basic Example Positioning Icon Marker Ribbon Marker Contextual Variations
